para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: NC parameter setting and modification are performed using the Parameter screen.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Ensure that the user level has the privilege to edit NC parameters. If necessary, please login with password.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: Refer to the Instruction Manual Chapter 4, “4.12 User Management Screen” for user login procedure.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: By default, Supervisor and Makino logins are able to edit the NC parameters.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: To display parameter without editing, no login is required.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Parameter writing enable alarm (SW0100) may appear, press both the
keys on MDI panel to reset the alarm.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: soft key on the screen. If the soft key does not appear, press the

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Display the parameter using either of the following procedures:

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-24px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:113px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:219px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-24px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:113px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:219px left ;
li.text: Enter the parameter number and press the

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-24px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:113px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:219px left ;
li.text: Move the cursor to the parameter number using the page keys

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Enter the setting value using the numeric keys in the MDI mode and press the

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Log out the user level to disable NC parameter editing.
